content.summary: Couple saw white light moving quicky

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   this happend in september of 96,i know its been a
while but i thought you would like to know ,i was coming back north
on us 27 in lakeplacid this ball of light came up over a state
trooper station right at me then backed up and stayed right along
side of me on the side of the south bound lanesit stayed with me for
about 3 miles then it took off i could still see it it went so far
away and came back in my guess about 5 seconds then it was only
about 2 miles from me it was shooting red and blue beems of light to
the ground then it drifed away ,when it was along side of me it was
so bright but did not lumanate anything and had tear drop shaped
lights swirling all around inside the white light they were rainbow
colored ,it was about the size of two full size vans ,and there was
no noise,it looked like it was pulling in energy and the lights
inside were gathering up what ever it was pulling in thats my theory
any way,the distance between us was about 75 to 100 ft.I wish i had
a camera that night and all the other times thank you .

Sighting report:   at around 10.45 gmt i was out setting up my
 table and this craft zoomed right by. as far as i cold see it
 was one craft but i may be wrong. there were four lights and two
 of them kept changing colours. they span around in a circle
 togother and it was all going so fast. it made a kind of
 "wooooooooo" noise as it went of. i only saw for about 10 
 seconds. thanks.

Sighting report:   location: middlesbrough, uk
date:       26th aug 2002

i d like to report a multiple ufo sighting witnessed by myself,
 my girlfriend and a friend of ours mid-afternoon saturday 26th
 aug 2002. conditions were very bright and clear.

we were all out on our roof garden enjoying the great weather and
 my girlfriend, who was lying on her back sunbathing, suddenly
 pointed straight up and said "whats that up there?" 

at first my friend and i couldnt really see anything obvious and
 this wasnt helped by the brightness of the sky or the fact that
 we didnt know what we were looking for. 
however within a few seconds of scanning the area my partner was
 indicating, we managed to spot what had captured her attention.

it appeared to be a small shiny silvery-white sphere, just
 hanging there above us - it was impossible really to say if they
 were very small or very high, but they were probably at least a
 few thousand feet high.

within a few seconds of spotting this sphere i noticed another
 one, and then another and then more. they were all in the same
 area of the sky and i think there were between 7-9 altogether,
 either just hanging there or moving very slowly.

at first we thought they might be birds but their movement was
 not consistent with this idea, no circling or anything - just
 stationary or drifting very slowly.

as we stood watching them, over a period of 4-5 mins they
 gradually moved into a  v  formation directly above us and
 stayed stationary in this position for several minutes - we
 realised then for sure that they couldnt have been balloons
 either and this was something out of the ordinary. we became
 quite excited at this point and i ran indoors to get my camera
 and our friend dashed of to his car to get his binoculars.

however, by the time we got back the spheres had begun to break
 formation and drift apart. looking through the binoculars didnt
 show any further detail,  but we could definitely see that they
 were solid objects.

i put my 70-210mm telephoto lens on my slr and snapped off a few
 pictures, one at around 70mm showing 3 of the spheres in the
 frame and another at 210mm showing just one. i have enclosed
 scans of the prints. 

upon enlarging the scan of the 210mm zoomed picture a little more
 detail became evident, showing in fact the object is not a
 sphere but more teardrop or shell shaped. it also seems to show
 a small trail or maybe a puff of gas venting  ? 

anyway, as we continued watching they all just moved off very
 slowly in different directions until they were out of sight. i d
 say the total duration of the sighting was approx 10-15 mins.  

unfortunately after later finishing off the roll of film i
 mislaid it and it didnt turn up again until a few weeks ago,
 which is why this report is so overdue.

best regards

- eric

Sighting report:   i was sitting on my porch at around 6 pm when i say a disklike object appear thorugh the clouds. it was flying north at a pretty fast speed. i noticed that it had two white lights, and one blinking colored light.

Sighting report:   i saw a total of four lights, 2 on top were
 blinking and two on the bottom were white. it wasn t a plane
 because they moved differently. it was fast and moved all over
 the sky. its march 19 2005. it was about 8:30ish when i saw it.
 i was walking home from a friends. it was a clear sky, very
 freaky.

Sighting report:   it was approximately 7.10pm on thursday, june 16,
2005 just as a bad storm was subsiding.  i was out on my porch
smoking when i noticed a black object very, very slowly moving
across the sky.  there is usually air traffic in the vicinity as
westchester county ny has a small airport a few miles away but this
object did not  act  like an aircraft.  it was not at great altitude
as the storm cloud cover was quite low, in fact on occasion the
clouds passed across the object.  i continued to observe, it
regularly appeared to change shape from circular to cigar but as it
came closer, i realised it was pitching & yawing.  the object did
not seem very large to me, smaller than say a light aircraft.  i had
to dismiss this object as perhaps a balloon, kite or similar as the
object was moving into the wind.  after perhaps 7-10 minutes of
viewing, the cloud cover was too great to see the object any longer
& i went back inside.

Sighting report:   it was tuesday morning 6-14-05 at 3am ,the sky
was clear and the stars were bright. i was takeing a break at work
and as i always do i look at the stars. in the corner of my eye i
noticed a large star like object moving slowly to the north .It was
to large and to slow to be a satelight and it seemed to dull to be a
star ,it just wasnt bright enough. i watched it move slowly across
the sky,it was about the hight of a passenger plane .It slowly went
over head and then it glowed a white light so bright that it seemed
to light up the sky.As this happened i pickup speed and the white
glow slowly started to get weaker till i couldnt see it anymore
.Thanks dean burgess

Sighting report:   today,6/14/05,3:30pm. sitting in back yard
looking north, a large jet flying south emitting 2 chem trails. as
trails start to disappear a round object appears, i ask both my son
and husband do you see that? at first i thought it might be a ballon
but realize it is too high in the sky to be a ballon i go in the to
get the binoculars and hand them to my husband, he spots the object
in the clouds and is trying to tell me where it is as i have lost my
visual of it.The clouds were going east and when i first saw it the
object was going west then went into the clouds. husband and son
spot object.Sun reflecting,very shiny metal,husband saysoh, my
god,its gone,shotstraight up in theair.Whole thing lasted at least
10 minutes.

Sighting report:   on the morning og june 11th, under clear sky
conditions, at about 9:15 - 9:45 am mdt i saw a formation of ufo s
at high altitiude overhead.  at first i heard a very loud military
jet that caused me to go outside and look.  i could not find the
jet, and the noise dissipated, but i did see a bunch of odd looking
objects in the sky overhead.  i counted five in a tight formation,
with several others moving around it.  i could see the hovering
overhead at a high altitude and then start to move east.  i got my
binoculars and studied them closer for a while.  i saw two types of
objects:
1) a white, round object that had soemthing dangling underneath it -
and it was not a hot air/weather balloon, very different.
2) a fast spinning object with an extremely brilliant white light on
either end.  it may have been two objects spiinign tightly together.
  the light was piercing.

all fo these objects worked independently of each other, yet were
moving as a group from west to east.  first hovering overhead for a
while, the speeding up towards the east.
these ufo s made no sound at all.

Sighting report:   it was today, the 19 of march, 2005. i think
 it was some time around 8:00 or 8:30 pm. it was night, i know. i
 saw some lights in the sky. there were two that were very white.
 they looked like stars, at first. but they moved in unison.
 there were to other that were multicolored. they may have
 actually been a series of multiple, smaller, different colored
 lights. i think it was just one large craft, because all the
 lights moved together. it wasn t moving to quickly at first,
 just drifting across the sky. at first i thought it was just a
 few planes that happened to be flying close to the ground.
 however, i realized there was no reason that two planes would
 flying so close, and traveling at the same velocity. after about
 five minutes the craft began to move faster into the distance.
 it continued to fly away, increasing speed and altitude as it
 went until i couldn t see it anymore. i discussed it with my
 family for a while, until we decided to report it to some
 organization and we found mufon.

Sighting report:   it happened at 8:42 in canton. i was just out
 in the yard having a smoke with a good friend whe we saw it. it
 flew from east to west really fast. i noticed it had a dark oval
 shape and was travelling probably beneath the clouds or maybe
 just amonmg the lower layers there were 4 lights and 2 were
 changing colors (very bright pinks and greens). it was larger
 than a jet and probably a bit more than twice as fast as one.   
                           as it sped of it made a looooooooo
 noise.

Sighting report:   daate: june 16/2005
time: 10:30pm
temp: 12 degrees celsius
conditions: dusk like sky with dark storm clouds... thunder storm
like conditions... no rain.
barometric pressure: 100 and rising
i was stopped at a light at the intersection of paris street and
brady street, when i noticed a bright blueish white light that was
circular in shape decend from the storm clouds and momentarily
paused in mid decent for a second or two. it then rose gradually
into the clouds agin in a westerlly direction.It seemed to get about
100 yards below cloud level at its lowest point and about the size
of a small plane. out of this world!!!!!!!! made me a believer!

Sighting report:   on thursday, april 28th 2005, i was sitting near
the intersection of west georgia and granville streets in the
downtown core of vancouver. this incident took place at
approximately 8:40 pm.
while i was consuming my dinner, 2 men were walking past me on the
street, looking up in the sky, and commenting on "how amazing"
something was. i ignored them for a few minutes, assuming that they
might be tourists, but another gentleman came along who was fixated
on something overhead. at this point, i looked up to see a black
disc-shape object. it remained at the same altitude, which i
estimate to be 1000 to 1500 feet. at this height, it was perhaps the
size of a nickel at arms length. for about 10 minutes, it drifted
very slowly in a northeasterly direction, still apparently at the
same height. the sun was setting at this point, and the sky was
getting very dark, and the object started to get smaller and
climbing in altitude as it drifted over coal harbour and the north
shore mountains. there was never any sound generated by this object.
it did not make any sudden directional changes. i could not
determine the size of it from top to bottom because it was overhead
mostly, but it certainly did not appear bulbous or balloon shaped.

Sighting report:   it was approsimately 12:30 am on saterday
 march 19 2005. i was in my bed almost asleep when i heared a
 soft ta-ta-ta sound coming from outside my window. when i looked
 outside and i saw two lites floting side by side blinking at the
 exactly the same time. i watched it go acrossed the sky for a
 minute in a very slight u shap headed northeast and then in an
 instant it sharply turned east without stoping and speeded of.
 it was a clear dark night the lights where shaped like eyes
 almost.The ufo was circular and it was a dark shiny color. a few
 seconds later i heared the same ta-ta-ta sound but when i looked
 out my window this time i couldn t see enything but by folowing
 the sound it sounded like it was headed in the same direction.
 this was at about 12:02am

Sighting report:   i was outside (8:30pm) and saw some object
 with 4 blinking lights overhead. two of the lights were solid
 white, and the other two were blinking many different colours
 rapidly. it hovered in the air for a couple of minutes, then
 bolted off at an incredibly speed. i m quite positive it wasn t
 any aircraft that i ve ever seen before. my wife saw it as well
 and we are both baffled.  i don t believe in ufos, but this was
 just plain wierd.

Sighting report:   i just wanted to let mufon know that i ve got
 some "real" insight into current activity (ufo) and that on any
 given night here in los angeles i can point out at-least one in
 the night sky. i was even allowed by "them" to witness a space
 craft upclose and right in the flight/landing path for airplanes
 at the burbank airport back in 2003. no other details on here.
 let me just say it was 50 feet above me.

Sighting report:   on the night of june there apear to be a low
hellocopter appx.9:00 the lights were so colerful no sound but a hum
it flew along slow and at a instant flew off i never saw nothing
like it i ran in to tell my mother just before it departed she
couldnt belive it we watch the news but no report we live near
edwards air force base ca. we use to seeing lights that been
reported as test missles but this was no thing of this planet i 4 1
no we are not alone

Sighting report:   today june 10, at 8:45pm i saw somthing i cant
explain. i went into my backyard to have a smoke and i was looking
at the sky when i noticed what looked like a orangish-yellow orb in
the sky. it was just hovering there, i could tell it wasnt moving
becouse it was lined up with a street light. after watching this
strange light for about a minute i noticed 2 more orbs, one on
either side of it. they were in a row, equally spaced but on a
slant. like this:
                                            <
                        <
    <

they all three hovered there for about another minute, then the orb
farthest to the right started slowling moving off in a straight line
to the right. i looked back at the other 2 orbs and noticed they
have both moved slightly to the right. at this point i have
completely lost sight of the first orb that moved. next the orb that
was originally in the middle started moving slowly to the right the
same as the last one did. i eventually lose sight of this orb also,
the last orb followed and identicle path right untill i lose sight
of it as well. i say i lost sight of them, but it was more like they
just faded out or disapeared. agian this sighting occurred in
brentwood, california at 8:45pm. if you need to contact me you can
do so via email at sbenzler62@comcast.Net. i am very interested to
find out if anyone else in the area saw somthing similar. thank you
for your time.
                    -sean benzler

Sighting report:   on march the 26th,1130am,it was a partly cloudy
day. as my wife and daughter where in the wal-mart store,in the mall
of orange, i sat out side to wait for them. i was looking as to how
blue and how clear the clouds looked. then from the anaheim hills
area or from an easterly direction i could see a shiny round object
coming in west,it was metalic and made no noise,i could not see if
it had lights becuse it was far and very shiney. it keept moving
west till i could no longer see it.I saw it for about 5 minutes.

Sighting report:   on march 23rd while in miami beach florida during
spring break week and wmc and m3. my friend and i were sitting out
on the balcony of our ocean front room of the h.J. dezerland resort
in miami beach, we witnessed some sort of ufo/ light phenomenon
occurring off the coast directly in front of us. the intense
yellowish-orange light appeared over the water. it seemed to be
getting brighter or the light was getting more intense and/or it was
coming closer to us. i asked him what is that? he replied,"i don t
know?" i then told him that it was definitely something. meaning of
a ufo nature. he nodded his head as we watched and observed. it was
bright and directly in front of us but way out over the ocean. then,
it would get dim and brighter and then dim. next, it went dim and
was gone. now about 2 seconds later (almost instantly) it was back
and with full intensity, but now it was at about 10 o clock not 12
o clock as it was before. then, it would do the same thing it was
doing before. going bright and dim, back and forth again. then
again, it went dim and boom there it was at full intensity but, now
at between 2 & 3 o clock on the horizon. instantly. i took a few
pictures of it with my cell phone camera. and i haven t tranfered
them to my computer yet because i don t have the cable to do so.
this all happened within about a 20 minute period and early in the
evening at about 7:30-8:30 on a very good night sky.
content.summary: Intense yellowish-orange light, dims then intensifies then disappears and reappears

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   it was tuesday night on march 15th at
approx.11pm.I was walking towards my house a couple of blocks away
and i stopped for the light.While waiting,a bright orange-reddish
light appeared out of nowhere.It was just to my right and didn t
appear that high,so i thought that it was a transformer going out.It
was a clear sky and no rain,so i know it wasn t lighting?I stood
there for a moment waiting to see if there were more,but nothing.It
reminded me of the fireworks on the forth of july.I
thought..Ok,thats kind of strange?I was almost home,actually,it was
around the corner,when another light appeared in the sky.It caught
my eye,just to the left.Again,it appeared out of nowhere.This time
it was green,only it wasn t round,but more like a flair,or like a
firework that is shot in the sky and slowly disapates.So i started
looking to see if someone had a flair gun and was shooting it off,or
maybe they were making a movie?(it s common in my area)but no such
luck.Again i just stood there waiting for something alse,but
nothing.I just want to say that the lights didn t appear to be
really high (and this may sound strange)but appeared to be far
away,even though close by..As if being projected,or brought into
view,as if in a different dimension and zapped into ours.This is the
best i can describe it.

i ve never reported anything before.This is my first time seeing and
reporting.I just had to tell someone and you guys were my best bet.
content.summary: Bright orange-reddish light, also a green second one

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting report:   walking outside i pointed out to my friend the
three planets forming an arc around the moon. he looked up and then
asked, "okay, but what s that?" he directed my attention to a large
v-shaped object smoothly moving across the sky, coming from the
south and heading slightly toward the northeast. it was in the
perfect shape of a v, sharp front point and very sharp tail points.
it had no running lights and was barely visible. it seemed to be
composed of numerous circular discs that had a slight glow, the
color of the sky but just a tad brighter. the spaces between the
discs were the same color as the night sky. there was no jet trail,
but there were none from any other jets so the air at whatever
altitude it flew must have been too warm. we waited until it reached
the horizon to hear its engine. we never heard anything. this craft
made no sound. since it headed in the general direction of edwards
air force base our assumption is that it might have been the next
generation of stealth bomber. its speed, in comparison with normal
jet traffic flying at 30,000 feet, was almost identical. if it was
traveling at that altitude, however, it would have to be 50% larger
than a typical passenger jet.

Sighting report:   hello, i sent a pic to dr maacabee who in turn
suggested i contact you with the info regarding the pic and the
sighting we all had. on 4-25-05 my family and i moved some of our
furniture from san mateo ca to tucson az and into our new house. our
permanent move is scheduled for early june. on 042605 myself, my
wife and her friend decided to take a ride around our new
neighborhood. we jumped into a jeep wrangler with the top off and
began driving. we noticed a new "chemtrail" had just been "laid" the
trail was placed west to east and although new it was beginning to
dissipate. approx 4 blocks from our house, our friend jennifer, who
was in the back seat said "you better look up". looking up, we
spotted an either luminous or self luminous object near the
chemtrail. we stopped the jeep for a better look. with naked eye the
object appeared to have some sort of protrubrance on it and it was
difficult to make out the shape. it "floated" slowly in and out of
the chemtrail. the chemtrail itself was moving with the wind, i
believe in a north-easterly direction. the object "followed" the
chemtrail. having no camera i began phoning my sons who were in our
new house with the idea of having them take pictures of the object.
getting no response from them we drove back to the house. as we
drove in we found our sons were also outside watching the object. i
retrieved a nikon 5.1 digital camera from the house and snapped a
shot toward the object, which was now "downrange" of the house and
quite small. i put the camera on zoom for the pic. the entire
sighting lasted approx. 15 minutes. i have read and heard that
chemtrails were "laid" at specific heights, so judging by this i
would say that the object must have been quite large in size
especially when it was viewed almost directly above us. i spent 4
years in the air force and 20 years as a san francisco police
officer. although this makes me no expert, i am perhaps a little
better observer of things. my opinion as i watched this object was
that this was no bird or any other familiar or manmade object that i
have observed.It appeared to us that this object was "sampling" the
chemtrail. i have the photo and can send it to you. the shape of the
object from the photo is really strange, not your typical ufo shaped
object. i have read the statement on your page about pictures, but i
am not sure how to send it via e-mail, let me know and i will do so.
my only regret is not having my camera ready when i needed it,
because i believe i could have gotten some outstanding shots when it
was above us. i was stationed at two bases in arizona, davis-monthan
(tucson), which was a strategic air command base, and luke (phoenix)
which was at the time a tactical air command base, i was in the air
police and i can tell you we saw and heard of very strange things.
one of my duties was working the desk where i would field calls from
citizens reporting ufo s, of course my instructions to them (since
project blue book had been dismantled) was to call their local pd.
so i "know" the deserts and the strange things that go on there. we
will be back permanently next month with camera ready this time. to
tell you the truth i dont think it will take much effort being in
this area to get additional pics of more objects.

thanks

dan baker

the above number is only good until 050105
if needed for any reason i can be reached at my business line
(anytime) at 1-877-274-3648

Sighting report:   in may of 2003 my wife and i took a mexiacn
cruise. after 3 days at see we where 2 or 3 miles off the baja
coast. it was approx. 11:00 and we were standing on the back of the
ship watching the stars. i noticed a object that seemed far off and
was flickering. the object did not appear to move. i knew we were to
far out for airplanes or anything else i could imagine. i have a 4
mega pixel digital camera so i took some pictures of the object. i
took one without zooming for perspective from where i was standing.
i then zoomed in at high res to see if i could get a close up of the
object. i took several more pictures for contrast. i wanted to make
sure that i was taking photos at the same spot and the camera was nt
moving. after we returned home i examined the photos on my computer.
i was shocked to find the close up photos were really strang. there
were trails and strings of colors and it seemed like many objects
moving in differeent ways leaving trails of colors. i have 4 photos
of the same object and all 4 show different objects colors and
formations. i would like to have these photos examined by someone
who may be able to tell me what it was. i have not shown these
photos to anyone but friends. we can not explain it. please advise
me on what i can do. i can email the photos if i can someone s
email. i saw that you offer that service but i didn t see a email
address. thank you. troy wallis.

email. i saw that you offer that service but i didn t see a email
address. thank you. troy wallis.

Sighting report:   daate: 08/01/1978 (approximate)
time: 05:30
duration: 10 minutes
sighting city: phelan
sighting state: ca
sighting zip: 92371
sighting county: san bernardino
witnesses: 3
shape: oval
number of craft: 3

driving from home in wrightwood, ca to work at
george afb in a 2-door sedan with 2 co-workers eastbound on hwy 18
between sheep
creek rd and hwy 395 near phelan, ca. myself and other witnesses
were
f4-phantom weapons control technicians in the usaf. my eastbound
view was of
mountains on horizon with first glow of sunrise behind mountains.
weather calm
and completely clear. 1st large oval rises up from directly behind
mountians due east from me. motion is slow, floating like a blimp
or balloon. at
first i thought it was a large blimp with a mirror-like exterior
reflecting
the sunlight (sun was below the eastern horizon during the entire
encounter), object was extremely bright, yet had a distinct oval
outline. after
rising a few degrees above mountains object stopped all motion.
total time to
rise up was about 2 minutes. second identical object then began to
rise
just to the left of the first object. second object moved
identically to
first, then stopped next to first at equal altitude. third
identical looking
object then began to rise just to right of first object, at same
slow rate,
until it was at equal altitude with other 2 objects. all three
objects
remained still for about 2 more minutes. very curious sight at
this time, but
all witnesses still thought objects were blimps. right-most object
then
begins to rise slowly above others, stops completely, then moves
from a
complete stop to a point slightly above the horizon almost
directly due south
of us (visible out the right side of the car) in about 2 or 3
seconds then
comes to a complete stop again. no acceleration or deceleration
was apparent.
middle object then does exactly the same, stopping next to the
other above
the southern horizon. third object then repeats the same exact
manuever.
when all 3 were stopped hovering next to each other then all 3
objects
slowly decended torwards the ground until disappearing on the
southern horizon.
objects retained their extreme brightness throughout the entire
encounter,
even when in a position near the southern horizon where there was
no
sunlight to reflect in my direction. all witnesses agreed with
each other not
to speak of the sighting due both to fear of ridicule, and due to
the fact
that all of us were under orders to speak of any potential ufo
sightings only
to our commanding officer (to my knowledge all af personnel,
including
myself and the witnesses, at the time were required to sign a
statement acknowledging the order upon enlisting in the af).






__________________________________ do you yahoo!? yahoo! small
business - try our new resources site!
h

Sighting report:   april 2, 2005
21:15 hours
triangular aircraft
partly cloudy sky with a cloud system moving in from the north.

outside temperature estimated at 60 degrees.

i exited my vehicle noticing a standout magnitude star at
approximately 21:13 hours. suddenly, an object moving from the south
or over my right shoulder came into my field of vision moving across
my left shoulder. the vehicle was moving at a substantial velocity
unlike regular air traffic over san luis obispo. additionally,
orange and white lights tipped this unusually shaped craft and did
not strobe - it was triangular in shape flying at an estimated
altitude between 3,000 and 5,000 feet moving south to north across
downtown. furthermore, this craft was silent and flying toward the
weather system moving in from the north.

unidentified flying event duration was approximately 4 minutes in
length. i did not capture the craft on film or video instead drawing
my best approximation of the vehicle. please note that san luis
obispo is an estimated 55 miles from vandenberg air force base.

sincerely,
-scot

Sighting report:   i just saw a ufo hovering around my area of
 the bronx. it was a set of four lights, one on each side (top,
 bottom, left and right). it was hovering around in a zig-zag
 pattern, and while it was doing this it was making a sort of
 sound like "looooooo". the two lights on the sides were white,
 while the top and bottom ones were flashing colors of green,
 blue, purple, yellow and white. i saw this at around 8:40 pm
 est.

Sighting report:   right now it is 6:15 pm.

about 5-10 minutes ago i saw something in the sky from my window.
 i went out on my balcony to get a better look. it s somewhat
 cloudy now, and the sun is setting, so my view may have been
 distorted, but i believe i saw a rather large flying object in
 the sky almost directly above me.

i can t say how big this object was as i cannot guess how far
 away it was from me, but i imagine it to be quite large. i
 couldn t see an actual object, but i could clearly see the
 lights on it. i will attempt to describe it now. it may sound
 confusing, but please bare with me.

assuming it was circular in a sense will make it easier for me to
 describe. at 12 o clock and 6 o clock, roughly, there appeared
 to be two rapidly blinking lights, constantly changing colors
 from purple to green to blue, etc. the two lights seemed to be
 in synch with one another, changing at the same time to the same
 colors.

at 3 o clock and 9 o clock were two steady white (yellow?) lights
 that did not blink nor change color.

these lights stayed in the same formation at all times, so that s
 what lead me to believe that it was a single object instead of
 four seperate objects. this is all conjecture, however.
 assuming, however, that it is a single object, the location of
 these lights make me think it was circular in shape, or even
 square. i can t be sure as i didn t see the object itself, only
 the lights it emitted.

i came inside to get my phone so i could call my friend who lives
 near by and ask him for his view of it. however, when i came
 back outside the object was gone. this is what bugs me the most
 about this sighting. my view is pretty clear for a great
 distance in all directions and as i said before, this object was
 positioned almost directly above me. i was inside for all of 10
 seconds at most. for it to be gone when i came outside means it
 either turned off its lights, flew into a higher atmosphere, or
 flew out past my range of vision. if it did move, it must have
 been moving pretty damn fast to have escaped my field of view in
 such a short amount of time.

i realize i live near lax airport, and i m no stranger to seeing
 planes flying overhead. but this is unlike anything i ve ever
 seen. the size, the shape, the way it just disappeared -
 something doesn t add up about this.


ps. please forgive any typing errors. i m kind of shaken by this
 and i m typing fast, trying to get this down before my mind can
 obscure the few facts i have.
content.summary: Large circular craft with lights on it overhead
